named-query.name: Join_FabbrIden_Nota_FabbrInfo.getNotaByFPS
named-query.query: SELECT nota FROM MuiFabbricatiIdentifica fabbr, MuiNotaTras nota , MuiFabbricatiInfo fabInfo WHERE nota.iid = fabbr.iidNota AND nota.iidFornitura = fabbr.iidFornitura AND fabbr.iidFornitura= fabinfo.iidFornitura AND fabbr.iidNota = fabinfo.iidNota AND fabbr.idImmobile = fabinfo.idImmobile AND LPAD(fabbr.foglio, 4, '0') = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') AND LPAD(fabbr.numero, 5, '0') = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') AND LPAD(fabbr.subalterno, 4, '0') = LPAD(:sub, 4, '0') ORDER BY nota.annoNotaDate DESC

named-query.name: Join_FabbrIden_Nota_FabbrInfo.getNotaByFPSubNonVal
named-query.query: SELECT nota FROM MuiFabbricatiIdentifica fabbr, MuiNotaTras nota , MuiFabbricatiInfo fabInfo WHERE nota.iid = fabbr.iidNota AND nota.iidFornitura = fabbr.iidFornitura AND fabbr.iidFornitura= fabinfo.iidFornitura AND fabbr.iidNota = fabinfo.iidNota AND fabbr.idImmobile = fabinfo.idImmobile AND LPAD(fabbr.foglio, 4, '0') = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') AND LPAD(fabbr.numero, 5, '0') = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') AND fabbr.subalterno IS NULL ORDER BY nota.annoNotaDate DESC

named-query.name: Join_FabbrIden_Nota_FabbrInfo.getNotaBySezFPS
named-query.query: SELECT nota FROM MuiFabbricatiIdentifica fabbr, MuiNotaTras nota , MuiFabbricatiInfo fabInfo WHERE nota.iid = fabbr.iidNota AND nota.iidFornitura = fabbr.iidFornitura AND fabbr.iidFornitura= fabinfo.iidFornitura AND fabbr.iidNota = fabinfo.iidNota AND fabbr.idImmobile = fabinfo.idImmobile AND LPAD(fabbr.foglio, 4, '0') = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') AND LPAD(fabbr.numero, 5, '0') = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') AND LPAD(fabbr.subalterno, 4, '0') = LPAD(:sub, 4, '0') AND fabbr.sezioneUrbana=:sezione ORDER BY nota.annoNotaDate DESC

named-query.name: Join_FabbrIden_Nota_FabbrInfo.getNotaBySezFPSubNonVal
named-query.query: SELECT nota FROM MuiFabbricatiIdentifica fabbr, MuiNotaTras nota , MuiFabbricatiInfo fabInfo WHERE nota.iid = fabbr.iidNota AND nota.iidFornitura = fabbr.iidFornitura AND fabbr.iidFornitura= fabinfo.iidFornitura AND fabbr.iidNota = fabinfo.iidNota AND fabbr.idImmobile = fabinfo.idImmobile AND LPAD(fabbr.foglio, 4, '0') = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') AND LPAD(fabbr.numero, 5, '0') = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') AND fabbr.subalterno IS NULL AND fabbr.sezioneUrbana=:sezione ORDER BY nota.annoNotaDate DESC

named-query.name: Join_Nota_FabbrInfo.getNotaTerrenoByFP
named-query.query: SELECT nota FROM MuiTerreniInfo terr,MuiNotaTras nota WHERE terr.iidFornitura = nota.iidFornitura AND nota.iid = terr.iidNota AND LPAD(terr.foglio, 4,'0') = LPAD(:foglio,4,'0') AND LPAD(terr.numero, 5,'0') = LPAD(:particella,5,'0') ORDER BY nota.annoNotaDate DESC

named-query.name: Join_Nota_FabbrInfo.getNotaTerrenoBySezFP
named-query.query: SELECT nota FROM MuiTerreniInfo terr,MuiNotaTras nota WHERE terr.iidFornitura = nota.iidFornitura AND nota.iid = terr.iidNota AND LPAD(terr.foglio, 4,'0') = LPAD(:foglio,4,'0') AND LPAD(terr.numero, 5,'0') = LPAD(:particella,5,'0') AND terr.sezioneCensuaruia=:sezione ORDER BY nota.annoNotaDate DESC

named-query.name: Join_FabbrIden_Nota_FabbrInfo.getNotaByFP
named-query.query: SELECT distinct nota FROM MuiFabbricatiIdentifica fabbr, MuiNotaTras nota , MuiFabbricatiInfo fabInfo WHERE nota.iid = fabbr.iidNota AND nota.iidFornitura = fabbr.iidFornitura AND fabbr.iidFornitura= fabinfo.iidFornitura AND fabbr.iidNota = fabinfo.iidNota AND fabbr.idImmobile = fabinfo.idImmobile AND LPAD(fabbr.foglio, 4, '0') = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') AND LPAD(fabbr.numero, 5, '0') = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') ORDER BY nota.annoNotaDate DESC

named-query.name: Join_FabbrIden_Nota_FabbrInfo.getNotaBySezFP
named-query.query: SELECT distinct nota FROM MuiFabbricatiIdentifica fabbr, MuiNotaTras nota , MuiFabbricatiInfo fabInfo WHERE nota.iid = fabbr.iidNota AND nota.iidFornitura = fabbr.iidFornitura AND fabbr.iidFornitura= fabinfo.iidFornitura AND fabbr.iidNota = fabinfo.iidNota AND fabbr.idImmobile = fabinfo.idImmobile AND LPAD(fabbr.foglio, 4, '0') = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') AND LPAD(fabbr.numero, 5, '0') = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') AND fabbr.sezioneUrbana=:sezione ORDER BY nota.annoNotaDate DESC

named-query.name: FabbrIden.getListaUIByNotaFabbr
named-query.query: SELECT distinct fabbr FROM MuiFabbricatiIdentifica fabbr WHERE fabbr.iidFornitura= :iidFornitura AND fabbr.iidNota = :iidNota AND LPAD(fabbr.foglio, 4, '0') = LPAD(:foglio, 4, '0') AND LPAD(fabbr.numero, 5, '0') = LPAD(:particella, 5, '0') AND (fabbr.sezioneUrbana=:sezione or fabbr.sezioneUrbana is null)
